[
    InlineHtml(
        InlineHtmlStatement {
            html: "<h1>\n    ",
        },
    ),
    FullOpeningTag(
        FullOpeningTagStatement {
            span: Span {
                line: 2,
                column: 5,
                position: 9,
            },
        },
    ),
    Echo(
        EchoStatement {
            echo: Span {
                line: 2,
                column: 11,
                position: 15,
            },
            values: [
                Literal(
                    String(
                        LiteralString {
                            value: ""Hello, world!"",
                            span: Span {
                                line: 2,
                                column: 16,
                                position: 20,
                            },
                        },
                    ),
                ),
            ],
            ending: CloseTag(
                Span {
                    line: 2,
                    column: 32,
                    position: 36,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
    InlineHtml(
        InlineHtmlStatement {
            html: "\n</h1>",
        },
    ),
]
